source.name: AggregatorListener
source.description: Source for listening to events triggered by aggregator

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

type.name: org.mule.extension.aggregator.api.AggregationAttributes
type.description:
Attributes with information regarding the containing aggregator and the aggregated elements
@since 1.0

parameter.name: aggregationId
parameter.description: The aggregation Id. It's value comes from the event's message correlationId. If the aggregator does not aggregate by correlationId, then this field will be an autogenerated value for the current aggregated group.

parameter.name: firstItemArrivalTime
parameter.description: The time in which the first aggregated value arrived.

parameter.name: lastItemArrivalTime
parameter.description: The time in which the last aggregated element arrived.

parameter.name: isAggregationComplete
parameter.description: A boolean value indicating if the aggregation is complete
